package main

import "fmt"

type M struct {
	Num int64
}

func T1() {
	fmt.Printf("----T1----\n")
	a := M{1}
	b := a
	fmt.Printf("%+v\n", a)
	fmt.Printf("%+v\n", b)
	a.Num = 2
	fmt.Printf("%+v\n", a)
	fmt.Printf("%+v\n", b)
}

func T2() {
	fmt.Printf("----T2----\n")
	a := &M{1}
	b := a
	fmt.Printf("%+v\n", a)
	fmt.Printf("%+v\n", b)
	a.Num = 2
	fmt.Printf("%+v\n", a)
	fmt.Printf("%+v\n", b)
}

func main() {
	T1()
	T2()
}
